Text.Page:
Okay, we're looking to demoralize the kulkari Crag Stalkers around the Basilisk Crag.

Go kill {@LinkCreature:21#9#Crag Stalker ragers}, {@LinkCreature:21#10#crushers}, and {@LinkCreature:21#5#prophets} and bring their bracelets to Nanarin at the Stone Pillar Relics when you've finished.
Good job silencing the clamorous Crag Stalker tribe. Without them, the kulkaris no longer have anyone to instigate violence.
I'm sorry, but you haven't finished your mission yet.
